hello I am Reverend Dr jeff Lucian i
have devoted my life to serving God and
my community through faith education and
compassion as the pastor of Tabernacle
Church one of the largest congregation
in Haiti his mission has gone beyond the
pulpit with a heart for the lost and the
broken Dr lucian believes in the power
of education and faith to transform
lives
dr lucen founded the Jerusalem
University of Pino also known and as UJF
UH this institution offers six majors
including Christian education computer
science business administration nursing
agriculture and theology each program is
designed to equip students with the
skills and knowledge they need to
succeed in their career and serve their
communities effectively
you just has not only educated
me but also instill a strong sense of
purpose within me i feel prepared to
make a difference in the world thanks to
the teaching of Dr luc we are just
educating students we are raising
leaders who will impact their society
and spread the gospel
under the leadership the Jerusalem
Baptist mission has gone to encompass
130 churches in Haiti and 15 in the
Dominican Republic dr lucian's passion
for evangelism and church planting has
led to remarkable growth and outreach in
undeserved area
reverend Dr lucian is also dedicated to
supporting the
vulnerable and through various
ministries he has established orphanages
and great schools providing care and
education to children in need his
commitment to social
welfare continues to be a beacon of hope
for countless
families
our mission is to bring light to our
communities it's about faith education
and service to

tomorrow i believe that in dire

hope is lost we can still call upon our
Lord for salvation and success
the psalmist cry reflects a desperate
plea that is often echoed in the depth
of of our
soul like in Haiti there
are many who feel swallowed by the
darkness yet we must remember that God
is a God of miracle in the midst of
despair
i recall a time when a young boy his
name is Jonah he was trapped in a gang
control area his family was terrified
but through our
organization we made the effort to reach
out and safely escort him
home his mother shared how they believe
they would never see him again
but the faith was
tested yet God had another
plan martin Luther King Jr says that
faith is taking a first step even when
you don't see the whole
staircase and I believe that just as the
psalmist
implores God for salvation we too are
